Description:
AFFORDABLE DEVELOPMENT SITE!
ATTENTION ALL DEVELOPERS AND INVESTORS, This property on approximately 1226 m2 of land is ideal for multiple townhouse development (Subject to Council Approval).
The real estate market in Clayton South is going from strength to strength and with the central Clayton market becoming almost out of reach, we see this opportunity as one to seriously consider.
The home has seen better days so it's all about the land here.
Well positioned, and in close proximity to Monash Freeway, Dingley Bypass, Springvale Shopping Centre and home maker centre (IKEA), Westall Train Station and Dingley shops also.
Feel free to contact us for more information.
AUCTION - UNLESS SOLD PRIOR!

Description:
Plans & Permits for 4 Units On 824SQM Approx!
Attention builders, developers and astute home buyers - This is your opportunity to purchase a generous block of 824sqm approx, with town planning permit for 4 luxury town residences in a highly desirable location. With exceptional land dimensions(18.9mx43.59m), this is a rare opportunity to capitalise on a magnificent and enticing development opportunity which is ready to go. Within walking distance from Westall train station, local shops and schools, easy access to Clayton Central, Clayton train station, Clayton Community Centre, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and IKEA Homemaker Centre, what more can you want?
Plans and permit include the following:
Unit 1 Double storey - 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 154.74sqm*
Unit 2 Double storey - 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 143.21sqm*
Unit 3 Single storey - 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 102.26sqm*
Unit 4 Single storey - 2 bedrooms, 1 bathrooms, 85.01sqm*
*Plans and Permit available upon request. Areas are approximate only
Features included: Brick home with spacious 4 bedrooms, master bedroom with ensuite and WIR, central bathrooms, loads of storage space, large living area, generous size kitchen with separate dining room, plus second family room, garage, all set on a massive block of land of 824sqm approx.
With a massive frontage of 18.9m approx. for multi-townhouses development, this property would be your best investment of the year!
Inspect now before it is too late!

Description:
AN IMMACULATE 3 BEDROOM HOME IN A GREAT POSITION
In great condition, resting on a corner block this home could provide a perfect start for a young family or make a great portfolio building investment. Fronted by a classic brick fa√ßade the home is warm and inviting with a light filled lounge/dining room and a tiled meals or family area adjoining the modern kitchen with a pantry and Miele stainless steel oven and stove. There are 3 robed bedrooms including the master with a walk in wardrobe and a renovated ensuite with floor to ceiling tiles that matches the equally impressive family bathroom. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling ensure you will always be comfortable while outside you find off street parking for 2 cars and a big backyard with side access gate, paved patio and 2 garden sheds. A great position completes the picture with buses, Clayton South Primary School and Clarinda Shopping Centre nearby and you can access central Clayton's shops and train station in minutes.
Insights: 1 Enngonia Crescent, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Owner says sell! Inspect today!
With it's own street frontage, private driveway to accommodate many cars and massive yard surrounding the home, this single level beauty offers modern living for the budget conscious.
This great property features a large living room opening to a brand new kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances. The family meals area is conveniently overlooking a lovely, fully landscaped backyard. 2 good size bedrooms both with built in robes , extra large bathroom with separate toilet, gas cooking and heating and a carport. All this within close proximity to Clayton shops, train station, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and local schools. Inspection a must!

Description:
Great location with A Flexible Future! 600sqm of land (Approx)!
Attention home buyer, builders, investors and developers! Live there or rent it out now and prepare for future development. With walking distance to Heatherton park, minutes away from Springvale Shopping Central, IKEA & Springvale Homemaker Centre, bus stops, Springvale train station, Westall train station, local shops, schools, and a short drive to Chadstone Shopping Centre, what more can you want?
Features: The home features three bedrooms, large lounge with wood fire heater, polished timber floorboards and an outdoor entertaining area. Also included are lock up garage, air conditioning unit and large back yard, all set on a fantastic block of land of 600sqm approx. With an enormous location and land size, this property would be your best investment of the year!
Inspect now before it is too late!

Description:
Amazing Open Plan Apartment
Investment Dream
This light and bright one bedroom apartment is perfectly positioned within walking distance to a redeveloped train station, buses, schools, parks and Monash Freeway for an easy commute to the CBD or beach. With master bedroom with built in robe, study nook, large central bathroom, European laundry and an off street car space, all that is left is to move in an enjoy. Offering an open plan modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and adjoining meals/living area with split system cooling leading out to a stylish balcony, perfect for enjoying your morning coffee.
Directly opposite Westall Shopping Centre and Westall Secondary College, and close to Springvale Homemakers Centre, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University, this hidden haven is perfect for investors with a ready to go tenant.
Call now for more details.

Description:
Brand new with contemporary design
This striking architecturally designed town residence offers sensational style and quality with impressive proportions delivering an exceptional opportunity to first home buyers, young families and investors. Finished in the very latest contemporary fixtures and colour schemes this magnificent town residence comprises of open plan living and dining, 2 generous robed bedrooms, superbly equipped Caesar stone kitchen with European appliances, modern central bathroom, powder room, 3 split system heating/cooling systems, water tank, private courtyard and remote single garage. Providing an easy care lifestyle this comprehensively equipped home features designer floorboards, carpet in bedrooms, 900mm stainless steel cook top and range hood, s/s dishwasher, landscaped gardens all within a short walk to Clayton train station, Clayton central, Monash Medical Centre, Clayton community & aquatic centre, and schools and buses.
George Korderas : 0417 521 080

Description:
POSSIBLE 3 UNIT SITE (STCA) AND A BEAUTIFULLY RENOVATED HOME TO MATCH
Located in close proximity to all the unique offerings in Clayton, including Monash University, central Clayton shops and transport, this newly renovated home on approx. 800m¬≤ of land offers so many opportunities.
Builder and developers will be attracted to the development potential of this large block, as well as the ability to keep the existing home and build a new residence at the rear (STCA).
Investors and owner occupiers will be impressed with the quality renovations to the existing 3 bedroom home. The home offers a generous lounge room, 2nd rumpus/sunroom, and stunning kitchen with stone benches, stainless steel appliances and glass splashbacks.
There are 3 bedrooms, including 2 with built-in robes, as well as a bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles and a separate toilet.
Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, and hardwood floors, while outside you find an extra-large garage with plenty of work and storage space, a bungalow, and a lovely backyard.
Very few homes offer so many possibilities. Inspect and be impressed!

Description:
A GORGEOUS & BEAUTIFULLY FINISHED BRAND NEW 3 BEDROOM UNIT
Brand new, brilliantly designed and beautifully finished, this rear unit on a block of just 2 is ready to simply rent out, or move into and enjoy. Style meets function here with features including a formal entry with engineered timber floors that also grace the spacious lounge/dining room that meets the galley style kitchen with stone benches, glass splash backs and stainless appliances. There are 3 large and robed bedrooms including the master with a walk in wardrobe and a lovely ensuite that complements the family bathroom with included second toilet. A host of extras add to the appeal including a study nook, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, all window furnishings and LED lighting that helps achieve a 6 star energy rating. Outside you find a double garage with remote controlled door and a landscaped courtyard with an entertaining deck and water tank plumbed to the toilets. A great location completes the picture with Westall Secondary College, buses, and local shops all nearby with Westall train station also within walking distance.

Description:
QUALITY TOWNHOUSE - PRIVATE SALE
A STYLISH & MODERN TOWNHOUSE
Thoroughly modern, surprisingly spacious and impressively detailed townhouse. Currently rented out at approx. $24,960.00.pa. until June 2015, this property provides a great income earner that you can choose to extend lease or move in at expiry in June 2015. Main features: A downstairs bedroom with proximity to a third bathroom/toilet; porcelain tiled living/dining area with multi-fold doors that open to the landscaped courtyard. The kitchen is stylish and practical with stone benches, gloss cabinetry and a freestanding 900mm stainless steel oven/stove. Upstairs you find 2 bedrooms that both feature their own en-suite bathroom and built in wardrobe while the front room also steps out to a lovely princess balcony. Additional features include a downstairs powder room, ducted heating, 4 split system air conditioners, an alarm and a single garage with remote controlled door. A great position completes the picture with Clayton South Primary School, buses and Clarinda Shopping Centre all just minutes away.
RING JAMES TAN FOR INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT ONLY 0450-351-760

Description:
Another Quality Property Sold by Byron Sweerts - Harcourts
Low Maintenance 8 Year Old Townhouse
This three bedroom townhouse features a contemporary layout and design and the convenience of a low maintenance block size.
The home features an open plan kitchen with granite bench tops which overlooks a spacious living area with polished timber floorboards throughout. Further extras include a downstairs powder room, ducted heating, split system air conditioning, internal access from the single garage, a covered outdoor area and your very own private courtyard.
The home is further topped off with a highly sought after location which has you only minutes away from Monash University, two train stations, shops and multiple schools in the area - a perfect choice for a first home buyer, investor or downsizer alike.
Insights: 5A Tennyson Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2019 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Smart Investment, Great Location - Under Contract
This is the kind of property that will appeal to both investors or home buyers. As not only will it provide for a great rental return but a low maintenance property that is larger than most and will cater for all your needs. All rooms are generously sized and a unique but functional design will impress those looking for something out of the ordinary. Featuring 3 large bedrooms with BIR's, master bedroom with WIR and ensuite, with a large private balcony and an upstairs outdoor private retreat to enjoy.
Situated in a convenient and in demand location that potentially has much more growth left. A short drive to Clayton Central or Springvale Shopping Centre and only minutes to Glen Waverley and Chadstone Shopping Centre. Westall/Clayton Station are within walking distance, with all important amenities also nearby.
Features:
3 Large Bedrooms
2 bathrooms, 3 toilets (1 downstairs)
Parking for 2 Cars (1 car garage and parking space)
Private Rear Yard and also upstairs open retreat
For the Investors
Potential Rental Return $520-$550 per week (was previously leased out at $540pw)
Less than 5 years old (Depreciation Benefits and low maintenance)

Description:
The beauty of a brilliant revival
A picturesque profile shining with modern beauty is the perfect introduction to the brilliant indoor and outdoor spaces of this stunning single-level home. A Designer renovation and a sunny personality are recurring themes throughout a spacious open plan living/dining domain, incorporating a sleek stone kitchen with quality appliances and rear family room versatile as a 3rd bedroom. Timber floors, neutral tones and stone throughout enhance 2 robed bedrooms, main with deluxe enusite plus stylish central bathroom. A serene sanctuary for young professionals, first home buyers, investors and downsizers, this superb home concludes with alarm, heating/cooling, garden courtyard and secure single carport with roller door, moments to Keeley Reserve, bus routes, train station, schools, Clayton shops and Monash Medical Centre.
George Korderas : 0417 521 080
